text: Shopify.com pe jain aur free trial start karen. Apna store name, email aur country select karen.  Yaad rakhen, apni target audience ke hisab se country select karna bohat zaroori hai!
Settings mein ja kar store ka naam, phone number aur email address sahi karen. Currency aur shipping details bhi check kar len. Cash on delivery option zarur enable karen!
Shopify themes mein se apne store ke liye ek attractive theme select karen.  Logo upload karen aur color scheme ko apne brand se match karen.  Mobile responsiveness check karna na bhulen!

step_heading: Products Add Karen aur Descriptions likhen
text: Apne products ki high-quality images aur detailed descriptions upload karen.  ChatGPT jaise tools se professional descriptions likh sakte hain. Keywords ka istamal zarur karen!
Privacy policy, refund policy aur terms of service add karna na bhulen. Navigation menu mein apne pages ko sahi tarike se arrange karen.  Customer reviews zarur add karen!
